commit message: Apply Apache License 2.0. VN is going open source!

Add Russian and Spanish translations.

Russian translator: Max Ponomaryov (ceejay)
Spanish translator: PaoloNB
Add missing XML DTD and license headers.

Fix ignore reasons not shown in Notification Log.

-Device State & Quiet Time ignore reasons not showing for non-repeats.
Replace most standard for loops with for-each loops.
Fix crash when mass un/ignoring while App List loading.
Fix VN not appearing in 4.2 Accessibility list.

Update Notification Log adapter when setting ignore.

Move ignore reasons to strings.xml.

Show ignore reasons in yellow if silenced while speaking.

Update ignore reason if silenced by ignore().

Fix crash on Test with 4.2 device in vibrate mode.

Add vibrate permission as required by 4.2 for sound notifications.
Change keyboard type for number preferences.
